codeanticode.chatbots.alice
Class Context

java.lang.Object
  codeanticode.chatbots.alice.Context

public class Context
extends java.lang.Object

A conversational context. This class stores information such as the history of a conversation and predicate values, which the Alice Bot can refer to while responding user requests.

Method Detail

addContextPropertyChangeListener

public void addContextPropertyChangeListener(ContextPropertyChangeListener listener)
Adds a property change listener to this context object.

Parameters:
listener - A property change listener. If there already is a listener with the same name of this one, the old listener will be discarded.

removeContextPropertyChangeListener

public void removeContextPropertyChangeListener(ContextPropertyChangeListener listener)
Removes a property change listener to this context object. Although listeners are stored by name, for the removing to actually occur it is not enough to simply pass a listener with the same name; the same object must be passed, otherwise this method does nothing.

Parameters:
listener - A property change listener.
